[FLINK-17357][table-planner-blink] add 'DROP catalog' DDL to blink planner

timeline.author: lirui-apache

timeline.bodyText: Do we have to put it under SqlDropExtended? I don't think it makes sense to support temporary catalogs.
timeline.author: lirui-apache

timeline.bodyText: If we enforce this check, I think we should support DROP CATALOG IF EXSITS
timeline.author: lirui-apache
